  1. 👀 sneak a look at this thing that measures the efficiency of responsive image sources (works with img[src], img[srcset], picture source[srcset])
    On twitter.com ♻️ 8 Retweets ❤️ 86 Favorites 2018 Mar 16 Mood +2 🙂
    1. …in reply to @zachleat
      Sample CSV output from image-report (a responsive images efficiency tester) imports nicely into a Google docs chart. You want the match to be as close to 0% as possible. Go over and you’re loading extra pixels you don’t need. Go under it’s blurry.
      Permalink On twitter.com ♻️ 2 Retweets ❤️ 13 Favorites 2018 Mar 17 Mood +1 🙂
